name: Robot pant!
description:
You lost your leg, so now you have to rely on these dumb robot pants that, mysteriously  follow by themself every bad guys. With the help of the weird pathfinding AI of your new legs, fight down this strange place and escape. 

Left click  to shoot and stop moving

really short.. and unfinish... sorry... 

Good Luck! ... you don't need it

Every code (the pathfind was hard coded) and art was made by me during the 3 days that I had allowed, and I learned half of what I known on Game Maker Studio in those time

What I would have add with more time: sound effect and music, bug fix for pathfinding and other, tutorial, end screen, more effect(screen shakes and particles), better path, more level ... add your in the comment
